snippet: The Obama administration is making a second attempt to systematically account for the dollar damage from greenhouse gas pollution, even with no consensus on how to forestall global warming or whether to do so.
abstract: Obama administration is making second attempt to systematically account for dollar damage from greenhouse gas pollution, even with no consensus on how to forestall global warming or whether to do so.
lead_paragraph: The Obama administration is making a second attempt to systematically account for the dollar damage from greenhouse gas pollution, even with no consensus on how to forestall global warming or whether to do so.

headline.main: New Effort to Quantify ‘Social Cost’ of Pollution
headline.print_headline: New Effort To Quantify ‘Social Cost’ Of Pollution
